topic.title: Deploying and Configuring a Gemcached Server
topic.shortdesc: You can configure and deploy Gemcached servers in a Java class or by using the gfsh command-line interface.

body.p: The following sections describe how to configure and deploy an embedded Gemcached server. You can configure and start a GemCached server either by invoking a Java class that calls the cache server's start() method, or by starting the cache server using the gfsh command line.
